verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-caitanya jaya nityānanda
jayādvaitacandra, jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-caitanya—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jaya—all glories; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya-advaitacandra—all glories to Advaita Ācārya; jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda—all glories to the devotees of Lord Caitanya.
translation: All glories to Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu! All glories to Lord Nityānanda Prabhu! All glories to Advaita Ācārya! And all glories to the devotees of Lord Caitanya!
